mapper.update: UPDATE user SET phoneNumber = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} != '' AND #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} != phoneNumber THEN #{contactInfo.phoneNumber} ELSE phoneNumber END, wechatID = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.weChatId} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.weChatId} != '' AND #{contactInfo.weChatId} != wechatID THEN #{contactInfo.weChatId} ELSE wechatID END, email = CASE WHEN #{contactInfo.email} IS NOT NULL AND #{contactInfo.email} != '' AND #{contactInfo.email} != email THEN #{contactInfo.email} ELSE email END WHERE userID = #{userId}
